note:
Teaching and researching computer algorithms at UT Dallas. Newly out trans girl. Married to a wonderful wife and mother to two boys who call me Moogie. Huge math and programming languages nerd. I play RPGs, metroidvanias, and puzzle games when I have time.

Profile picture is a selfie of me taken in my house. Background is a poorly drawn sketch of a person trying to walk their dog as they move along two polygonal curves in the plane, as one does.
